claim_summary: Act 538 of 2025 §§9–12 appropriate $26,215,247 for the trauma system including $24,237,291 in expenses【849297760235391†L795-L828】, $1,950,000 for the Health Building and Local Health Grant Trust【849297760235391†L833-L858】, $325,000 for Nuclear Planning Grants【849297760235391†L861-L880】, and $60,000 for Emergency Medical Services【849297760235391†L883-L920】.

source.title: Act 538 of 2025 – Department of Health Appropriation (Sections 9–12)
